forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: progress of 'archopal's home'

comments.text: progression is on hold until one of the other maps is nearly finished. may work on removing textures and replacing 'certain objects' to help reduce lag and allow later additions.
forgot to mention this but i found out my dumbass past self gave the giant ground disk a texture. lag seems to have noticibly reduced since i removed that.
build area mostly cleared, skybox remade and harder to pass through, area will now remain listed unless another major addition is being made.
left unlisted until now due to multiple break-ins by community members with a dissregard for privacy. still being wary for repeated offenders.
area is 'done' as far as i'm concerned for now, plans to clean build area are there. i'll return if west m.path is next to build but not before others are finished.
